title: Augusta: Robert Yates Ramsey to Maggie, October 17, 1864
summary: Ramsey writes from a prisoner of war camp in Maryland. He describes his health and notes how he is comforted by his faith. He notes his wish to be among friends and asks forgiveness for an unspecified action.
keywords: Church/Religious Activity, Death/Casualties, Family, Prisons/Prisoners, American Civil War
